findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected initializer
findings.description: The initializer functions are not protected, allowing anyone to call them and potentially cause unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The 'transfer' function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is not properly protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have any protection or access control, allowing unauthorized users to increase allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is not protected and can be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is internal and lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is not protected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is unprotected and can be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Unprotected renounceOwnership function
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function can be called by anyone, allowing an attacker to take ownership of the contract.

findings.title: Unprotected transferOwnership function
findings.description: The function executes transfer of contract ownership to a specified wallet without proper access control.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is public and does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromDividends function
findings.description: The excludeFromDividends function can be called by anyone, including unauthorized users, which may lead to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected updateClaimWait function
findings.description: The updateClaimWait function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Unprotected updateMinimumTokenBalanceForDividends function
findings.description: The updateMinimumTokenBalanceForDividends function is declared as external and lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify the minimum token balance for dividends.

findings.title: Unprotected process function
findings.description: The 'process' function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized actions.

findings.title: Unprotected processAccount function
findings.description: The processAccount function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.
